original_title: The Wacky Adventures of Ronald McDonald: The Monster O' McDonaldland Loch
overview: The gang travels to Scotland where a scientist attempts to build a replica of the Loch Ness Monster. Birdie befriends the Loch Ness Monster who wants his existence to be kept a secret.
title: The Wacky Adventures of Ronald McDonald: The Monster O' McDonaldland Loch
